item.title: Compile Error (with pic)
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“sk8ter, post:3, topic:20155”]change

//Rune if(removeID == 1213 || removeID == 3101 || removeID == 1432 || removeID == 1147 || removeID == 1289 || removeID == 1333 || removeID == 1303 || removeID == 1163 || removeID == 1185 || removeID == 1347 || removeID == 1373 || removeID == 1113 || removeID == 1201 || removeID == 1079 || removeID == 1093 || removeID == 1319 || removeID == 1127 || removeID == 824 || removeID == 4824 || removeID == 44 || removeID == 868) { return 2363; } public int barsNeeded(int slot, int column) { if (column == 1119) { if (slot == 0 || slot == 1) return 1; if (slot == 2 || slot == 3) return 2; if (slot == 4) return 1; } if (column == 1120) { if (slot == 0 || slot == 1) return 1; if (slot == 2 || slot == 3) return 3; if (slot == 4) return 2; } if (column == 1121) { if (slot == 0 || slot == 1 || slot == 2) return 3; if (slot == 3) return 5; if (slot == 4) return 1; } if (column == 1122) { if (slot == 0 || slot == 4) return 1; if (slot == 1 || slot == 2) return 2; if (slot == 3) return 3; } if (column == 1123) { if (slot == 0 || slot == 1 || slot == 2 || slot == 3 || slot == 4) return 1; } return 0; }

to

//Rune if(removeID == 1213 || removeID == 3101 || removeID == 1432 || removeID == 1147 || removeID == 1289 || removeID == 1333 || removeID == 1303 || removeID == 1163 || removeID == 1185 || removeID == 1347 || removeID == 1373 || removeID == 1113 || removeID == 1201 || removeID == 1079 || removeID == 1093 || removeID == 1319 || removeID == 1127 || removeID == 824 || removeID == 4824 || removeID == 44 || removeID == 868) { return 2363; } return 0; } public int barsNeeded(int slot, int column) { if (column == 1119) { if (slot == 0 || slot == 1) return 1; if (slot == 2 || slot == 3) return 2; if (slot == 4) return 1; } if (column == 1120) { if (slot == 0 || slot == 1) return 1; if (slot == 2 || slot == 3) return 3; if (slot == 4) return 2; } if (column == 1121) { if (slot == 0 || slot == 1 || slot == 2) return 3; if (slot == 3) return 5; if (slot == 4) return 1; } if (column == 1122) { if (slot == 0 || slot == 4) return 1; if (slot == 1 || slot == 2) return 2; if (slot == 3) return 3; } if (column == 1123) { if (slot == 0 || slot == 1 || slot == 2 || slot == 3 || slot == 4) return 1; } return 0; }[/quote]

This one is more complicated but add another “}” after the:

return 0; }

item.title: Compile Error (with pic)
item.dc:creator: @sKuLL819 sKuLL819
item.description:
@sKuLL819 wrote:

I’m running SplashScape

Below is what I have on my client.java

//Rune
     if(removeID == 1213 || removeID == 3101 || removeID == 1432
     || removeID == 1147 || removeID == 1289 || removeID == 1333
     || removeID == 1303 || removeID == 1163 || removeID == 1185
     || removeID == 1347 || removeID == 1373 || removeID == 1113
     || removeID == 1201 || removeID == 1079 || removeID == 1093
     || removeID == 1319 || removeID == 1127 || removeID == 824
     || removeID == 4824 || removeID == 44 || removeID == 868) {
      return 2363;
     }
public int barsNeeded(int slot, int column) {
 if (column == 1119) {
  if (slot == 0 || slot == 1) return 1;
  if (slot == 2 || slot == 3) return 2;
  if (slot == 4) return 1;
 }
 if (column == 1120) {
  if (slot == 0 || slot == 1) return 1;
  if (slot == 2 || slot == 3) return 3;
  if (slot == 4) return 2;
 }
 if (column == 1121) {
  if (slot == 0 || slot == 1 || slot == 2) return 3;
  if (slot == 3) return 5;
  if (slot == 4) return 1;
 }
 if (column == 1122) {
  if (slot == 0 || slot == 4) return 1;
  if (slot == 1 || slot == 2) return 2;
  if (slot == 3) return 3;
 }
 if (column == 1123) {
  if (slot == 0 || slot == 1 || slot == 2 || slot == 3 || slot == 4) return 1;
 }
 return 0;
}

Think you know what’s wrong? Help me plz.
